src_original: taiḥ puṣpair buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca subhūtiṃ ca sthaviram
tgt_original: 散佛菩薩摩訶薩比丘僧及須菩提上。

src_original: atha khalu sarvasmiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau puṣpasaṃstaraḥ saṃstṛto 'bhūt. upariṣṭāc cāntarīkṣe puṣpakūṭāgāraṃ saṃsthitam abhūt ramaṇīyaṃ
tgt_original: 是時三千大千世界華。 悉周遍於虛空中。 化成華臺。 端嚴殊妙。

src_original: na punar imāni puṣpāṇi mayā sarvadevabhavaṇeṣu dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi pracaranti yānīmāni puṣpāṇi devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni nirmitānīmāni puṣpāṇi na  yānīmāni devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni manomayāny etāni puṣpāṇi naitāni puṣpāṇi vṛkṣagulmalatānirjātānīmāni devaputrair abhyavakīrṇāni.
tgt_original: 是天子所散華。 天上未曾見如是華。
